title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.7 - Cost of proceedings to be paid by applicant
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 604.7 - Cost of proceedings to be paid by applicant

State Regulations

The cost of the hearing is to be borne by the petitioner, who will be required to furnish a suitable place for the hearing, publish and
pay for the publication of the notices, arrange for the services of a competent
recording stenographer and pay for such services. Two copies of the
stenographic minutes shall be furnished the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
604.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
